replies.body: {{champion:201}} "Ah how I looked like in my younger years."
more like ezreal trying to cosplay bruam

pretty much this.
braum is a man, not a child....

look at how low the camera angle is, even further proving it is child.

I think you're missing the point of cosplay. This Braum clearly spent a lot of time making an amazing piece. He should be given props, not talked down to because he doesn't have the same physical features as the character model.
I mean, the shield is really impressive, but also... did you guys see those gauntlets and boots? Dude put in some supreme effort and does NOT deserve ridicule...

This.

And--dear Lord, are those LEDs in the shield? I wouldn't have even *bothered.* All the details. All the props.
I don't think he can pick up the shield

> [{quoted}](name=Layesse,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=InV1fNdd,comment-id=000c0000000000010004,timestamp=2015-03-21T03:06:32.776+0000)
>
> I don't think he can pick up the shield

Dont worry! it had wheels
be glad i wasn't ripped, it would be really weird to see a 15 jacked kid walking through a con with barely any clothing
Give 'im a break. He had an idea and a dream and he rolled with it xD
Exactly. The Heart is the strongest muscle!
This right here. And the craftsmanship on his shield is on point. {{champion:201}}

Cosplay isn't about whether or not you "look" the part. I think he looks fantastic, his craftsmanship is out of this world, and I give him props for confidence to do such a BIG piece. 
That's the thing people forget about cosplay, it's about having fun and doing something you love. This guy might be a Braum main and wanted to give tribute to him favorite champ. You go dude, and thanks for giving up such a spectacle of an amazing champ. ;D <3
BEHOLD, THE FIRST KNOWN SIGN OF KINDNESS IN THIS GAME's COMMUNITY!!!! Ahhh, its a beautiful change {{item:3070}} {{item:2049}}

At the risk of sounding incredibly sexist I feel the need to ask, for the sake of finding others who might agree: Am I the only person that is bothered by the cos-players that dress as Champions of the opposite gender? Looking at you female Darius and male Morgana. {{summoner:21}}

Cosplay is about someone bringing "their" impression of the champion to the table. If you play a champion and love it. Why would you need any other reason for Cosplaying it. You don't just sound sexist.

I don't think it should be outlawed or anything, I live in America and believe in rights and all that. It just hurts me to see a champion who should have a penis being played by someone with a vagina and vice versa a champion who should have a nice rack being portrayed by a flat chested dude.

"It just hurts me to see a champion who should have a penis being played by someone with a vagina and vice versa a champion who should have a nice rack being portrayed by a flat chested dude." So you only play male OR female champions? If I love playing as x, what stops me from cosplaying as them? Your disgust? Please, grow up.

It's an opinion, one way to look at things. It has nothing to do with right or wrong, it's just that he feels bothered by them not like he's insulting them. 

I kind of have the same opinion, it bothers me a little that it isn't the "same" as the original champion. But that does not mean I hate them, people put effort into those and look great I'm not denying that; just it isn't my cup of tea. Not every comment has to be about hatred, or sexism or racism. 

And while I can only speak for myself whether or not they have a nice body does not change the fact that I am bothered by a cross gender cosplay. Again I have no problems with people doing that, rather I find them admirable for putting the effort into it but it isn't something I would search up.

When I try to go to full screen all I get is a small box with text that says "Image failed to load" 

RIOT PLS FIX!!!
